description: Number of orbits on points that are at n steps from the origin in the f.c.c. lattice.
links: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, Low-Dimensional Lattices VII: Coordination Sequences, Proc. Royal Soc. London, A453 (1997), 2369-2389 (Abstract, pdf, ps).
Index entries for sequences related to f.c.c. lattice
formula: G.f. is conjectured to be (1-x^5)/((1-x)*(1-x^2)^2*(1-x^3)) (a conjecture of Simon Plouffe, see A023054).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_ and _J. H. Conway_
